013package org.apache.juneau.svl;
014
015import java.text.*;
016
017import org.apache.juneau.*;
018
019/**
020 * Exception that occurs during a var resolver session.
021 *
022 * <ul class='seealso'>
023 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../overview-summary.html#juneau-marshall.jm.SimpleVariableLanguage">Simple Variable Language</a>
024 * </ul>
025 *
026 * @serial exclude
027 */
028public class VarResolverException extends BasicRuntimeException {
029   private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
030
031   /**
032    * Constructor.
033    *
034    * @param cause The cause of this exception.
035    * @param message The {@link MessageFormat}-style message.
036    * @param args Optional {@link MessageFormat}-style arguments.
037    */
038   public VarResolverException(Throwable cause, String message, Object... args) {
039      super(cause, message, args);
040   }
041
042   /**
043    * Constructor.
044    *
045    * @param message The {@link MessageFormat}-style message.
046    * @param args Optional {@link MessageFormat}-style arguments.
047    */
048   public VarResolverException(String message, Object...args) {
049      this(null, message, args);
050   }
051}
